```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

### Load in Automobile Power Generation Function

**For 30 m/s**  
```{r 30 m/s}
source(here("working", 'power_gen_function.R'))

a <- power_gen(m = 31752, V = 30, A = 16)
```

**For 80 km/hr**  
```{r 80 km/hr}
b <- power_gen(m = 31752, V = 22.22, A = 16)
```

**For 120 km/hr**
```{r 120 km/hr}
c <- power_gen(m = 31752, V = 33.33, A = 16)
```

**For 40 km/hr**
```{r 40 km/hr}
d <- power_gen(m = 31752, V = 11.11, A = 16)
```

**For 5 km/hr**
```{r 40 km/hr}
e <- power_gen(m = 31752, V = 1.389, A = 16)
```

**Plot**
```{r compile and plot}
power_df <- data.frame('power' = c(a, b, c, d, e),
                       'speed' = c(30, 22.22, 33.33, 11.11, 1.389))

power_df %>% ggplot(aes(x = speed)) +
  geom_point(aes(y = power))
```
